title: The Voyage of Mael Duin's Curragh
text: The Voyage of Mael Duin's Curragh is a 1990 novel written by <a href="Patricia%20Aakhus">Patricia Aakhus</a>. The novel was Aakhus's first published book, and retells the ancient Irish legend "<a href="The%20Voyage%20of%20M%C3%A1el%20D%C3%BAin">The Voyage of Máel Dúin</a>", an adopted son of a chieftain's widow who accidentally learns of his true parents. The novel retrieved significant acclaim upon its release, including a national review by "<a href="The%20New%20York%20Times">The New York Times</a> on 28 January 1990.
